items.title: Tell HN: AI could bring back GraphQL from the brink
items.summary: With rest apis, you have to bring in documentation and such into context. With Graphql you just need the endpoint, and an API token. You can then tell the AI to explore the API to accomplish whatever goal you need. Graphql has become really useful for my work in that regard. Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46627941 Points: 4 # Comments: 0

items.title: Opinion: Why tech leaders can't regulate AI before releasing them?
items.summary: Lately i've been seeing news about people calling out tech leaders for calling out AI haters. In my opinion, this is an easy situation to avoid. If you have the capacity to develop the models, and host them in thousands of square miles of AI datacenters, you should be able to regulate the models from the get go. To be compliant with the current law around the world, our common sense, and the real demand for AI. And that's exactly why Elon's Grok is being blocked in few countries. Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46626864 Points: 1 # Comments: 3
